bio:
Bendt is an elderly chef at the Bards College in the city of Solitude.
Bendt is the chef for the College, preparing and serving the food for the bards at regular intervals. His kitchen is in the basement of the Bards College building.
He is a rather grumpy individual and not usually in high spirits. The exception to this is when he gives out free candy to those attending the Burning of King Olaf festival.
Quotes:
"Meals are served to bards at designated times. Find an inn if you want to make requests."
"You've found the Bards College kitchen. Congratulations."
"You look a little sturdier than most of the popinjays around here."
During the Burning of King Olaf festival: "You might as well have some sweets. I made them for the festival after all."
name: Bendt
